form.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

unsave.title: Unsaved Changes
unsave.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave without saving?

not-found.title: 404 - Page Not Found
not-found.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
not-found.contactSupport: If you think this is a bug, please contact support.

error.title: Oops! Something went wrong
error.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
error.noPermissions: No permission to call API {{apiName}} please contact administrator.

noPermissions.title: No Permission to Access API {{apiName}}
noPermissions.description: You do not have permission to access this page. Please contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you something amazing!
comingSoon.subDescription: This feature is under development and will be available soon.
